text: @narendramodi @myogiadityanath Respected Modi ji🙏🏻Just for a suggestion— We can use Hotels for giving shelters to the poor people. Else we can also use Hotels as a Hostipal for Covid-19 patients. Australian government is also using Hotels for Quarantine.
